HomeSection.mainTitle:

crypto-dashboard.title: Real-Time Cryptocurrency Dashboard
crypto-dashboard.description: I developed a comprehensive dashboard for cryptocurrency tracking and portfolio management, focusing on high performance and real-time data delivery using Next.js and the CoinGecko API.

details.titleParagraph: As a Software Engineer, I focused on delivering a high-performance and visually intuitive user experience:

strongParagraphs.title: Performance and Real-Time Data
strongParagraphs.text: I optimized the application's performance by integrating the CoinGecko API with Server-Side Rendering (SSR) via Next.js, resulting in a 70% reduction in initial load time and ensuring up-to-the-minute market data.

strongParagraphs.title: Type-Safe Portfolio Management
strongParagraphs.text: I built the 'My Portfolio' feature from scratch, allowing users to track their asset performance. The use of TypeScript ensured the integrity and security of all financial data handled by the application.

strongParagraphs.title: Modern & Responsive UI/UX
strongParagraphs.text: I crafted a modern and fully responsive interface using Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI, implementing interactive charts and a Dark Mode theme for a functional and visually appealing user experience (UX).

professional-portfolio.title: High-Performance Personal Portfolio with Next.js
professional-portfolio.description: I developed my professional portfolio with Next.js and TypeScript, focusing on performance, SEO optimization via SSR, and an interactive user experience with project filtering and Dark Mode.

details.titleParagraph: As a Software Engineer, my goal was to create a digital showcase that not only displayed my projects but also demonstrated technical excellence:

strongParagraphs.title: Performance and SEO with Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
strongParagraphs.text: I used Next.js and TypeScript to build an application with Server-Side Rendering (SSR), ensuring optimal search engine indexing (SEO) and achieving sub-1-second load times.

strongParagraphs.title: Zero-Latency Project Filtering
strongParagraphs.text: I implemented an interactive and dynamic filtering system for the project gallery, using React's state management to allow recruiters and clients to browse categories instantly.

strongParagraphs.title: Modern UI with Persistent Dark Mode
strongParagraphs.text: I crafted a visually impactful interface with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI, integrating Next-Theme to offer a professional, persistent Dark Mode experience that enhances user's visual comfort.

code-connect-auth.title: SPA Authentication System with Social Login
code-connect-auth.description: I developed a complete authentication system as a Single-Page Application (SPA), focusing on a streamlined user experience with social login and fluid navigation.

details.titleParagraph: My responsibility was to create a robust and intuitive authentication flow, from the user interface to the navigation logic:

strongParagraphs.title: Streamlined Social Login
strongParagraphs.text: I implemented a secure authentication system featuring OAuth providers like Google and GitHub, simplifying the sign-up process to enhance the new user experience.

strongParagraphs.title: Fluid SPA Navigation
strongParagraphs.text: I developed the entire login and registration flow as a Single-Page Application (SPA) using React Router DOM, ensuring instant transitions between routes without page reloads.

strongParagraphs.title: Responsive UI & Real-Time Validation
strongParagraphs.text: I built a modern interface with Tailwind CSS and implemented client-side form validation, providing users with immediate feedback for a frictionless sign-up experience.

bueno-books.alt: Interface of the Bueno Books platform
bueno-books.title: Book Discovery Platform with React
bueno-books.description: I developed Bueno Books, a book discovery platform featuring real-time search, built on a reusable component architecture with React and Tailwind CSS to ensure scalability.

details.titleParagraph: As a Software Engineer, I focused on creating an interactive and scalable user experience, from data fetching to visual presentation:

strongParagraphs.title: Real-Time Dynamic Search
strongParagraphs.text: I implemented a search feature that filters and displays results from a book API instantly, using React component state to manage the query and update the UI without delay.

strongParagraphs.title: Scalable Component Architecture
strongParagraphs.text: I architected the UI with reusable components (like Header and BookCard) in React and utilized Tailwind CSS for rapid, consistent styling, ensuring clean, maintainable, and scalable code.

strongParagraphs.title: Engaging Dynamic Content
strongParagraphs.text: I created dynamic sections such as 'Latest Releases' and 'Suggestions' by consuming multiple API endpoints to enrich the platform and encourage user discovery of new titles.

javascript-calculator.title: Responsive Calculator with Vanilla JavaScript
javascript-calculator.description: I developed a fully functional web calculator using vanilla JavaScript, creating a custom calculation engine that parses complex mathematical expressions and a responsive interface for a seamless experience on any device.

details.titleParagraph: As a Software Engineer, I focused on building a robust and efficient application from scratch without relying on frameworks:

strongParagraphs.title: Intelligent Calculation Engine
strongParagraphs.text: I developed the calculation engine from the ground up in pure JavaScript, implementing an algorithm that parses and evaluates mathematical expressions while respecting the order of operations (PEMDAS) and parentheses.

strongParagraphs.title: Responsive UI with HTML/CSS
strongParagraphs.text: I built a modern and fully responsive user interface with semantic HTML5 and CSS Grid, ensuring an intuitive and consistent user experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

strongParagraphs.title: Framework-Free State Management
strongParagraphs.text: I created a state management system in vanilla JavaScript to handle user input, pending operations, and result display, efficiently manipulating the DOM without any external library dependencies.

PortfolioPage.title: Projects
PortfolioPage.description: Each project below is a practical showcase of how I use React, Next.js, and TypeScript to build high-impact digital solutions, with a focus on performance, scalability, and quality code.

AboutSection.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Gabriel Bueno, a Front-end Software Engineer with one year of professional experience building with modern technologies. My mission is to leverage React, Next.js, and TypeScript to build interfaces that are not only visually appealing but, most importantly, fast, robust, and optimized for the user experience.
AboutSection.paragraph2: As a self-taught professional, I'm driven by a curiosity for solving complex problems, from pure JavaScript algorithms to SSR performance optimizations. I believe the foundation of a great product is clean, maintainable code, which is why I follow the philosophy that quality code is code that any team member can read, understand, and maintain. I am a proactive, collaborative team player, adept at agile methodologies.
AboutSection.paragraph3: I am currently seeking a fully remote opportunity to apply my passion for technology to challenging projects. If you're looking for a professional who combines technical expertise in performance and SEO with strong communication and a focus on teamwork, let's connect.

ServicesSection.subHeading:
